column4: i still don' t understand how to install things i download off of the internet
tar.gz files
most often you don't need to
that's what apt is for
you can run it natively
that doesn't mean anything
... it's really not that hard
I'm pretty sure there's even a howto
it's really not that hard
just need to read the howto
they're not going to auto-run
you have to open them up and select what you want (except possibly for audio cd's)
..... what exactly are you trying to do?
one at a time. Which game are you trying now?
ok
you've installed wine already?
actually.. what video card do you have?
you need to either give up and go groveling back to you MS masters or suck it up.
So far you've mentioned trying to install warcraft3 and doom3 both of which are very well supported under wine or natively respectively
if you've actually installed wine you can probably just double click the setup.exe file on your warcraft 3 cd
you don't need to do anything with winecfg for that
what exactly happens when you double click install.exe
try from a terminal
cd /media/cdrom && wine install.exe
